sql.if: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.update: UPDATE health SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, reg_date=sysdate WHERE bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select * from health where bno = (select bno_prev from (SELECT bno, LAG(bno, 1, 9999) OVER(ORDER BY bno DESC) AS bno_prev FROM health) where bno = #{bno})
select * from health where bno = (select bno_next from (SELECT bno, LEAD(bno, 1, 9999) OVER(ORDER BY bno DESC) AS bno_next FROM health) where bno = #{bno})
